participant_1.background:
I'm a creative person who enjoys using my imagination to create new things.
I love the challenge of a good fight, but I also enjoy the peace and quiet of practicing my flute.
i love to go shopping.
My job at the gas station is going well, but I'm having trouble keeping up with my schoolwork.

I'm a runner who never brings my weapons into the kitchen.
i don t have children.
i like listening to other rap music too.
i blame myself for all of my problems.
I have trouble finding shoes that fit my big, six-toed foot.

content.text: Just got back from the art museum. I love it there.
Oh wow, are you an artist?
Not really, but I love to create things. I enjoy the challenge of finding new ways to express myself.
I'm a runner. I love the challenge of pushing myself to go faster and farther.
That's great! Do you compete in races?
I don't. I just run for fun. I enjoy the peace and quiet of being outside.
I love that too. It's so therapeutic. I'm glad you have something you enjoy doing. I'm having trouble keeping up with my schoolwork and my job.
Oh, that's tough. What are you studying?
I'm studying business, but I'm not sure if it's what I want to do with my life.
Well, you're not alone. A lot of people change their majors. It's all about finding what you're passionate about.
Thanks for the advice. I think I'll take some time to think about it.
No problem. I'm always here to listen.
